path: artifacts/Neonic Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.NeonToken: contracts/Neonic Full Smart Contract Security Audit/NeonToken

findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Owner has excessive privileges (e.g., changing pool details, holder's address, and emission feature).
